description.english: Prove your worth to the Measurehead.

displayName.russian: Она ни о чем не жалеет

description.english: But you could have called her much earlier.

displayName.english: It's always nice to make new friends

description.english: Meet Peach and Plum. Those are really their names.
description.russian: Познакомься с Пич и Плум. Это действительно их имена.

displayName.english: Draw me like one of your French girls
displayName.russian: Нарисуй меня как одну из своих француженок

displayName.english: We need to do this as often as possible
displayName.russian: Мы должны делать это как можно чаще

description.english: Don't be shy about doing it in public.
description.russian: Не стесняйся делать это на публике.

description.english: What did you say to her?
Hear a piece of story from Yuki.
Don't worry, she won't tell anyone.
description.russian: Не волнуйся, она никому не скажет.

displayName.english: It wasn't the water that made her wet

description.english: Become a personal swim coach for Yuki.
description.russian: Стань личным тренером Юки по плаванию.

description.english: Go on a date with Ruth.
Finish your date with Chrissy. Or was it not a date?
description.russian: Закончи свидание с Крисси. Или это было не свидание?

description.english: I didn't like the movie anyway.
description.russian: Мне фильм все равно не понравился.

displayName.russian: Не такая уж она и плохая

description.english: You just made sure of that.
description.russian: Ты только что в этом убедился.

displayName.english: I like her just the way she is
displayName.russian: Она мне нравится такой, какая она есть
Не такая уж она и старая

displayName.english: Now everything is in its place

description.english: I will give her what she deserves.
description.russian: Я дам ей то, чего она заслуживает.

displayName.english: She enjoys every inch of it

description.english: I never thought posing could be such a joyful process!
description.russian: Я никогда не думал, что позирование может быть таким увлекательным процессом!

description.english: Could you find a better place?

displayName.english: It's much more comfortable on the bed

description.english: Didn't you only come here to talk?
description.russian: Разве ты не пришел сюда только для того, чтобы поговорить?

displayName.english: I will sue him if I see him ever again
displayName.russian: Я подам на него в суд, если увижу его снова

description.russian: Значит, дело было не только в алкоголе.

description.english: What did she expect? You are not the Virgin Mary.

displayName.english: Am I Really Going To Die?
displayName.russian: Am I Really Going To Die?

displayName.english: You're in Love With a Psycho
displayName.russian: You're in Love With a Psycho

description.english: The twins paid you an unexpected visit.
With this outfit, you can get anywhere. Almost.
description.russian: С таким можно попасть куда угодно. Почти.

description.english: How? From where? Nevermind, she liked it.
Didn't your mother teach you to knock?
description.russian: Твоя мама не учила тебя стучаться?

description.english: You decided to spend the evening with Sophie.
description.russian: Ты решил провести вечер с Софи.

description.english: Sophie was left in awe after spending the evening with you.
description.russian: Софи осталась в восторге от проведенного с тобой вечера.

description.english: You decided to spend the evening with Peach and Plum.
description.russian: Ты решил провести вечер с Пич и Плум.

description.english: Peach was left in awe after spending the evening with you.
description.russian: Пич осталась в восторге от проведенного с тобой вечера.

description.english: Plum was left in awe after spending the evening with you.
description.russian: Плум осталась в восторге от проведенного с тобой вечера.

description.english: My first time. Don't judge me.
description.russian: Мой первый раз. Не судите строго.

description.english: You decided to spend the evening with Chrissy.
description.russian: Ты решил провести вечер с Крисси.

description.english: You and Chrissy have been able to fully associate yourself with the characters of the film.
description.russian: Вы с Крисси смогли полностью ассоциировать себя с героями фильма.

displayName.english: There is no place like home

description.english: You decide to hear what Mia says.
description.russian: Ты решил послушать, что скажет Мия.

displayName.english: What a waste of a lovely night?
displayName.russian: What a waste of a lovely night?

description.english: Against all odds, you have maintained your friendship with Mia.
description.russian: Вопреки всему, ты сохранил дружбу с Мией.

displayName.english: Somebody That I Used To Know
displayName.russian: Somebody That I Used To Know

description.english: Mia had a meeting with Plum.
Next time, keep the nails shorter.
Mia had a meeting with Peach.

displayName.english: If you mess with the best...

description.english: You will die like the rest.

displayName.english: Not exactly the threesome you were hoping for
displayName.russian: Не тот тройничок, который ты ожидал

You've been very good to Yuki and she appreciates it.
description.russian: Юки от тебя в полном восторге.

displayName.english: You must like the smell, huh?

description.english: Make a deal to help Sophie.
description.russian: Пойти на сделку, чтобы помочь Софи.

description.english: Complete Episode 6. One way or another.

description.russian: Кто-то просто не умеет хранить секреты.

description.english: Complete Episode 6. One way or another.
Go to hell with your advice.
description.russian: Шла бы ты со своими советами.

description.english: The girl in the next cabin was absolutely fascinated.
description.russian: Девушка из соседней кабинки в полном восторге.

displayName.english: The first day of the rest of your life
How I Spent My Summer Vacation

description.english: That would be a great essay.
Oh, she certainly wasn't expecting that!
Plum remembered the meeting with Mia.
Who else could think of such a thing?

displayName.english: I guess this is my paradise?
This world makes perfect sense to me

description.english: All I'm looking for is peace.
description.russian: Я здесь ищу только одного - покоя.

displayName.english: The best night of your life

description.english: Would she remember it in the morning?
description.russian: Вспомнит ли она об этом на утро?

description.english: In a couple of minutes you'll want more...
description.russian: Через пару минут ей снова захочется...

description.english: Don't disturb people while they work.
Impress all the skeletons in the closet. Wait a minute, I know where this is from!
description.russian: Впечатлить всех скелетов в шкафу. Погодите... Я знаю, откуда это!

description.english: Stay with Sophie against all odds.
description.russian: Остаться с Софи, несмотря ни на что.
Начать все с чистого листа вместе с Крисси.

description.english: This does not lead to anything good.
At least there is no censorship.
description.russian: По крайней мере, тут нет цензуры!

description.english: Find a new role for yourself in your relationship with Plum.
description.russian: Внезапно обнаружить себя в новой роли в отношениях с Плум.

description.english: Take on a new case with June.
description.russian: Взяться за новое дело вместе с Джун.

description.english: Candy, pool, BBQ, cigars - in that exact order.
description.russian: Кэнди, бассейн, барбекю, сигары - именно в таком порядке.

description.english: Feels Like We Only Go Backwards.
description.russian: Мы будто движемся в обратном направлении.

description.english: I will find my true love again...
description.russian: Однажды я снова найду свою настоящую любовь...

description.english: I'm not looking, I'm just... peeping.
Find a reason to reminisce together with Mia.
description.russian: Найти повод поностальгировать вместе с Мией.

description.english: Move your relationship with Peach and Plum to the next level.
description.russian: Перевести отношения с Пич и Плум на совершенно другой уровень.

description.english: Is this a new fetish or?.. Oh my god...
description.russian: Это новый фетиш или?.. О боже...

description.english: Become the reason for a new relationship.
